name: Slime Card Collection
description:
Slime Cards are a little pixelart project I undertook, originally for a friend's NFT marketplace (I know, I'm sorry, it wasn't quite as bad as OpenSea or whatever but still, it was a mistake) and now available to download for free! Because fuck NFTs!

If you're interested in source files as well let me know! I composed these in a custom program, and then recorded the result, so I have the card art, animations, and backgrounds in separate files, both in aseprite format and png.
